评论概述: Amazing sweater/ designer look a like!
评论详情: My daughter has a similar sweater from an expensive clothing store. When I saw this one, I thought why not try it and I love it! It’s so soft, it fits true to size and has the most fun ruffled collar. I loved it so much I ordered the gray as well! Such a great sweater.

I picked this up as a backup to a work sweater and this did not disappoint. The frills at the top make it nice for work and adds to outfit. I can’t stand being cold and this sweater is very warm and super soft. Fits true to size and I would definitely buy again and in additional colors.

While not "white" like the description,  it is a cute sweater. It is a looser knit, not super heavy. The off white runs on the warmer side. The ruffled collar is attractive and lays nicely. The cuffs and waistband are nicely ribbed. It is a shorter boxy style. Runs true to size. Not oversized.

评论概述: Not the same sweater as photos: fabric is solid color, not heathered, and lesser quality
评论详情: I like this InterNos Womens Y2k Ruffled Collar Cardigan very much. At 5'10", 34DD, 150 lbs, I requested the Large and it fits well: the crop is just right and the sleeves are plenty long. However, I gotta call out nonsense with false product images when I see it--it's maddening and wrong. Attached pics were taken after the first delicate wash and hang dry. The fabrication is decent, but It's clearly not the gorgeous heathered knit shown in the listing--not that i was expecting it from 100% polyester anyway. At time of review, there are no actual product images available to buyers beyond this point. Proceed with caution.

My wife likes the crop top style to wear with her wide-leg jeans.  She likes the color, the buttons and the ruffle collar.  Those are all very nice style features.  The polyester fabric actually feels like a wool sweater would feel, somewhat course, but stretchy.  It is true to size and washed up great.

This cardigan is adorable.  Love the ruffled collar. I got a size Large because there wasn’t a larger size offered (XL is my usual selection). Even with it unbuttoned it looks great over a work dress or with a t-shirt and jeans.
Very odd style not at all as pictured
I wore this to work on a chilly day, it keeps you warm without making you look frumpy. Very professional thanks to the design and the color!

评论概述: Such a sweet looking sweater that has a nice soft feel but a good weave so it's warm
评论详情: I like the longer sleeves, and the cute, ruffled collar. I also really like that it's a short sweater that fits right at the waist.
